fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Invite a player into a private channel with you and other invited players during the day. 3 Uses.
- Vote on who to use the Official's extra votes on.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Invited players will be given frame immunity.
- You have 2 extra, private 'organization' votes. During the night, all invited players may vote for who these extra votes should be used on. Whoever gets the most votes will be voted by these 2 extra votes.
